onset.Description: Onset time of event in seconds

duration.Description: Duration time of event in seconds

Levels.movie: Movie clip shown to participant (social content)
Levels.response: Response period for participant to answer about the video
Levels.social_full: Full duration of a social trial from video to end of response window

social_type.Description: Type of social cognitive content featured in the video

Levels.Mental: Mentalizing condition (inferring others' thoughts, feelings, intentions)
Levels.Random: Non-social control condition with random content

response_time.Description: Time taken by participant to respond, in milliseconds

accuracy.Description: Participantâ€™s response accuracy for the trial (1.0 = correct, 0.0 = incorrect)

response.Description: Button response provided by the participant (button press or selection)
